Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.exceptions.model

package it.polimi.ingsw.server.exceptions.model
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    AssistantCardNotPlayableException
    Class AssistantCardNotPlayableException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to use an Assistant Card which cannot be played since another player already used it in the same turn
    CharacterCardAlreadyInUseException
    Class CharacterCardAlreadyInUseException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to use a Character Card which cannot be played since another player is already using it
    CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException
    this class rapresent an exception that is thrown when we send incorrect character card parameter
    CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException
    this class represents an exception that is thrown when player tries to use a character card which has no more uses available
    CharacterCardNotPurchasedException
    Class CharacterCardNotPurchasedException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to use a Character Card which has not been purchased by the Player
    CloudPickInvalidException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when the player chooses an empty cloud, unless the Bag is also empty
    CollectionUnderflowError
    this class represents an exception that is thrown when the player try to take a number of students from an object that doesn't contain the required number of Students
    EmptyCollectionException
    this class represents an exception that is thrown when the player tries to take an element from an empty collection
    IncorrectConstructorParametersException
    Class IncorrectConstructorParametersException is thrown whenever a constructor is initialized with wrong parameters
    InsufficientTowersException
    this class represents an exception that is thrown when player tries to place more towers than what are available
    InvalidPlayerCountException
    Class InvalidPlayerCountException is thrown whenever a match is created with a wrong Player count for the match type
    IslandSkippedControlAssignmentForStopCardException
    Class IslandSkippedControlAssignmentForStopCardException is thrown whenever an Island's control assignment needs to be skipped because on the Island is present the stop card
    IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException
    Class IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException is thrown whenever an Island's influence calculation needs to be skipped because on the Island is present the stop card
    LobbyFullException
    Class LobbyFullException is thrown whenever a Player tries to log in to a full lobby
    MessageDecodeException
    Class MessageDecodeException is thrown whenever the Network message's decoding process failed
    NicknameNotUniqueException
    Class NicknameNotUniqueException is thrown when a player chooses an already existing nickname
    StudentHostingCardIncorrectUpdateParametersException
    Class StudentHostingCardIncorrectUpdateParametersException is thrown whenever the parameters for a CharacterHostingCard are not correct
    StudentMovementInvalidException
    Class StudentMovementInvalidException is thrown whenever a Player tries to make an illegal Student's movement
    TableFullException
    Class TableFullException is thrown whenever the dining room is full
    TooManyTowersException
    Class TooManyTowersException is thrown whenever the Player attempts to take control of more Towers than the maximum number
    UnavailableCardException
    Class UnavailableCardException is thrown whenever a Player tries to use an unavailable Card
    UnavailableStopCardsException
    Class UnavailableStopCardsException is thrown when a Player tries to use a stopCard even though the card doesn't have one
    WizardAlreadyChosenException
    Class WizardAlreadyChosenException is thrown when a player chose an already chosen Wizard
